entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 14 April 2023
